text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Michigan already did that. Oh, now we have 2 cases of Coronavirus in Michigan. One traveled to another country, the other didn’t! Failure on this administration to protect American people from beginning. You had test that didn’t work, not enough test, restrictions who to test!
